import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react" import { Outlet } from "react-router-dom" import io from "socket.io-client" import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css" import "./App.css" import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify" import { MDBSpinner, MDBContainer, MDBInputGroup, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCheckbox, MDBRange, MDBRadio, MDBCard, MDBCardHeader, MDBCardBody, MDBCardFooter, MDBModal, MDBModalDialog, MDBModalContent, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalTitle, MDBModalBody, MDBModalFooter, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit" import Game from "./Game" const socket = io({ path: "/socket", }) window.socket = socket const defaultSettings = JSON.stringify({ commentKey: "join", follower: true, friend: true, giftCount: 1, giftName: "rose", joinEvent: "chat", maxPlayer: 100, unfollower: true, winnerShowDuration: 10, }) const LoadingPage = () => { return
server connecting...
} const SettingsCard = ({ current, update }) => { function handleChange(e) { const target = e.target const type = target.type const name = target.name var value = target.value switch (type) { case "radio": if ("true false".includes(value)) { value = value === "true" } break case "checkbox": value = target.checked break case "number": case "range": const min = parseInt(target.min) const int = parseInt(value || min) const float = parseFloat(value || min) value = Math.max(min, int, float) target.value = value break case "text": break default: } return update((current) => ({ ...current, [name]: value })) } return (
{current["joinEvent"] === "chat" && ( )} {current["joinEvent"] === "gift" && ( )}
) } function App() { const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = useState(socket.connected) const [event, updateEvent] = useState({}) const [settings, updateSettings] = useState( JSON.parse(window.localStorage.settings || defaultSettings) ) const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false) const tiktokIdRef = useRef(null) const startBtnRef = useRef(null) const [basicModal, setBasicModal] = useState(false) const toggleShow = () => setBasicModal(!basicModal) const start = () => { tiktokIdRef.current.setAttribute("disabled", true) startBtnRef.current.setAttribute("disabled", true) const id = tiktokIdRef.current.value socket.emit("createRoom", id) window.localStorage.setItem("lastTiktokId", id) setIsLoading(true) } const controller = (action) => { updateEvent({ name: action }) socket.emit("control", action) } useEffect(() => { socket.on("connect", async () => { setIsConnected(true) console.log("socket connected") }) socket.on("disconnect", () => { setIsConnected(false) }) socket.on("tiktok-chat", (data) => { updateEvent(data) }) socket.on("tiktok-gift", (data) => { updateEvent(data) }) socket.on("tiktok-follow", (data) => { updateEvent(data) }) socket.on("tiktok-share", (data) => { updateEvent(data) }) socket.on("tiktok-like", (data) => { updateEvent(data) }) socket.on("tiktok-connectSuccess", () => { toast.success(`Connected successfully!`) setIsLoading(false) }) socket.on("tiktok-connectFailed", (error) => { tiktokIdRef.current.removeAttribute("disabled") startBtnRef.current.removeAttribute("disabled") toast.error(`Connect has failed: ${error}`) setIsLoading(false) }) socket.on("tiktok-streamEnd", (reason) => { tiktokIdRef.current.removeAttribute("disabled") startBtnRef.current.removeAttribute("disabled") toast.info(`Livestream has ended: ${reason}`) }) return () => { socket.off("connect") socket.off("disconnect") socket.off("tiktok-connectSuccess") socket.off("tiktok-connectFailed") socket.off("tiktok-streamEnd") } }, []) useEffect(() => { window.localStorage.setItem("settings", JSON.stringify(settings)) clearTimeout(window.settingsTimeout) window.settingsTimeout = setTimeout( () => socket.emit("updateSettings", settings), 1000 ) }, [settings]) useEffect(() => { console.log(event.name, event.uniqueId) }, [event]) return ( <> {!isConnected ? ( ) : ( <>

Widget url: {window.location.origin + "/widget" + "?cid=" + socket.id}
